summary: Chris’ eyes peeled open, slowly, the rustling in the room loud enough to wake him up. The spot next to him was empty, he became...
body:
Morning

Chris’ eyes peeled open, slowly, the rustling in the room loud enough to wake him up. The spot next to him was empty, he became suddenly aware of his surroundings; his drunken stupor from last night the cause of his now hammering headache.

“Shhh,” he heard her soft gentle voice in the distance.

So he turned, following the direction of her voice and saw her piling things quickly into her handbag, Dodger as close to her as he could be.

“Y/N…” he managed in a groggy voice, as loud as his hangover could permit.

Y/N jumped, her compact mirror falling to the floor and Dodger caught off guard too, jumped. She hadn’t been expecting him to wake up so soon; he was a deep sleeper and she was kind of counting on that to make her great escape. She stood still, hoping he was still half asleep and would eventually collapse back.

“Where are you going?” he said, slowly sitting up, the sheets covering his lower body; his toned torso on display, serving as a torturous reminder of what transpired last night. She shook off the thoughts immediately and looked back at him boldly.

“I…uh…thought I’d go home…” she couldn’t think of an excuse quick enough.

“Don’t leave,” he asked softly.

Y/N pursed her lips nervously, “Chris…last night-“

“Please don’t say ‘was a mistake,’ because it wasn’t and you know that,”

She looked away, knowing he was right. Especially since she’s the one that came onto him.

“Can you just get back in bed? Let’s talk later, it’s…” he cast a quick glance at the clock on his bed side table. “7am…I have a killer migraine, but I really want you to stay,”

“But Scott’s coming over later-“

“So? He saw us kissing last night, anyway,” Chris bargained.

“Yeah but I don’t want him to know that we…” she stopped herself, feeling like a teenager and unable to say the ‘s’ word.

“He doesn’t have to know,” Chris laughed. “Come on, stop playing, get back here or imma hop outta this bed, with my naked self and make you,”

Y/N pursed her lips again, this time stiffling a laugh at the unintended innuendo in his statement.

“You know what I meant, now c’mon, before I make Dodger see more than he bargained for. It’s too early for R-rated Chris,” he teased. “We can talk later about us later, I promise,”

“Okay, but keep your hands to yourself,” Y/N threatened playfully.

“Deal, I can do that,”

“Put some boxers or something,”

“Throw me a pair, please,” he smiled.

“And also,” Y/N said, walking towards the bed, Dodger still in tow. “You make me breakfast later,”

Without contemplation, Chris agreed, “Sure,” Chris nodded as she climbed on the bed, Dodger settling at the foot and watching on as if he knew what was going on. “Anything else?”

“No,” Y/N bit her bottom lip.

“I can’t believe you were doing the walk of shame in my shirt,” Chris chuckled, now lying on his side and looking at her adoringly.

“I couldn’t find my clothes,” Y/N rolled her eyes, feeling embarassed that she’d been caught. “Go back to sleep, you’re talking too much,”

“Well, c’mere,”

“I said no hands,”

“Funny, y’never said that last night,” Chris challenged. “Now, come here,”

“So demanding,”

“Please,” then Y/N complied, shuffling closer to him before he engulfed her, holding her the same way he did last night after their heated intimate session and fell asleep.

And suddenly everything felt okay, the tension alleviated and it was like Y/N belonged right there in his arms, and Chris belonged there; behind her holding her. He kissed the top of her head, her coily hair still smelling of the fruity conditioner that he loved whenever she used it.

“You comfortable?” he mumbled. She nodded. “Good, because I’m not letting you go anytime soon,”


___

******gif not mine*****

summary: “Evans passed on Marvel's first offer, a nine-film deal. The studio came back with a six-film contract, and Evans passed again....
caption:
“Evans passed on Marvel’s first offer, a nine-film deal. The studio came back with a six-film contract, and Evans passed again. He accepted an invitation to visit Marvel Studios […] but made it clear that he wasn’t planning to change his mind.”
– Alex Pappademas, The Hollywood Reporter

summary: Drabble: I Wanna Hold Your Hand
title: Drabble: I Wanna Hold Your Hand
body:
This prompt from @jewels2876 was from the Fluffy Sentence Starters prompts list that I reblogged last night. (I still am accepting requests if anyone else wants to send me an ask).

This drabble started one way, but then The Beatles song “I Wanna Hold Your Hand” came to mind and I know Chris is a big fan of The Beatles (as am I) and it seemed too perfect to not use.

Title: I Wanna Hold Your Hand
Pairing: Chris Evans x reader
Rating: PG
Warnings: n/a 

Disclaimer: This work of fiction is not to be reposted or used without my permission.

You were in the laundry room of the house you shared with your husband, Chris Evans, moving wet clothes from the washing machine to the dryer, when you heard music coming towards you. Curious, you turned and stopped Chris as he appeared in the doorway.

“Oh yeah I tell you somethin’,” he sang along with The Beatles. “I think you’ll understand.”

He came into the room and grabbed your hand as the band sang, “I want to hold your hand.”

In the moments that followed, you were treated to a beautiful serenade as Chris sang along.

Oh please say to me
You’ll let me be your man
And please say to me
You’ll let me hold your hand
Now, let me hold your hand
I want to hold your hand

He let go of your hand a couple times to really sing the song, but every time the lyric “I want to hold your hand” was repeated, he found your hands again.

As the song ended, he took both of your hands in his and said, “I like how your hand fits in mine.” Then he kissed you.

reblog.comment:
This prompt from @jewels2876 was from the Fluffy Sentence Starters prompts list that I reblogged last night. (I still am accepting requests if anyone else wants to send me an ask).

This drabble started one way, but then The Beatles song “I Wanna Hold Your Hand” came to mind and I know Chris is a big fan of The Beatles (as am I) and it seemed too perfect to not use.

Title: I Wanna Hold Your Hand
Pairing: Chris Evans x reader
Rating: PG
Warnings: n/a 

Disclaimer: This work of fiction is not to be reposted or used without my permission.

You were in the laundry room of the house you shared with your husband, Chris Evans, moving wet clothes from the washing machine to the dryer, when you heard music coming towards you. Curious, you turned and stopped Chris as he appeared in the doorway.

“Oh yeah I tell you somethin’,” he sang along with The Beatles. “I think you’ll understand.”

He came into the room and grabbed your hand as the band sang, “I want to hold your hand.”

In the moments that followed, you were treated to a beautiful serenade as Chris sang along.

Oh please say to me
You’ll let me be your man
And please say to me
You’ll let me hold your hand
Now, let me hold your hand
I want to hold your hand

He let go of your hand a couple times to really sing the song, but every time the lyric “I want to hold your hand” was repeated, he found your hands again.

As the song ended, he took both of your hands in his and said, “I like how your hand fits in mine.” Then he kissed you.

blog.name: odetolove06
blog.title: Ode to love
blog.description: Female. Writer, artist. Stucky art, Marvel stuff and more. Stucky love all the way. ❤ Drawing and writing is my life. I post pictures, create GIFs and draw. Maybe occasionally write posts. Sebastian Stan, Chris Evans and Colin O'Donoghue are love. ❤ Marvel girl. Favorite TV shows: Supernatural, Sherlock (BBC), Stranger Things. Movies and music are everything. Hopefully, you might like something on my blog so you're welcome to stick around. :) Spreading love and making people happy is what I do. Feel free to drop a message anytime or ask questions.

summary: I love how happy these two are around each other. 💗
body: I love how happy these two are around each other. 💗
